content.html:
I did a quick test with this patch:

diff -r 88a35d757cb1 gz3d/build/gz3d.js
--- a/gz3d/build/gz3d.js    Fri Oct 27 09:06:33 2017 +0800
+++ b/gz3d/build/gz3d.js    Mon Oct 30 17:44:07 2017 -0700
@@ -893,6 +893,7 @@
  */
 GZ3D.Gui = function(scene)
 {
+  console.log('GUI constructor');
   this.scene = scene;
   this.domElement = scene.getDomElement();
   this.init();

+++ b/gz3d/test/gzgui_test.js   Mon Oct 30 17:44:07 2017 -0700
@@ -1,5 +1,7 @@

+console.log('gzgui test ================= ')
+
 describe('Gui tests', function() {

I see GUI constructor printed out only once in each test. Maybe I'm not catching the duplicate objects?
